title.rendered: Top List of Computer Professional Society in Canada

content.rendered:
Are you a graduate focusing on learning new skills and demonstrating competency in the workplace and society? A student studying in Canada or international students focusing on joining the growing economy of technology. Imagine a certification that could tell your employer or client you’re up-to-date with today’s most needed skills in the information technology environment.

  • Who is Eligible to Join Computer Professional Bodies in Canada
  • Categories of Membership and Qualification

Contents

Introduction

Who is Eligible to Join Computer Professional Bodies in Canada

Categories of Membership and Qualification

How to Apply as Member of Computer Professional Society in Canada

Introduction

IT profession continuously grow daily in the market and IT expert emerge daily. This trend increases the market economy of Information technology (IT).  In order to enhance the vision and mission of IT profession, the need for the establishment of more Computer Professional Organization in Canada and environs. Several Computer professional organization has been inaugurated under the laws and regulations of Canada government in each province.

Each province has a provincial body that administers the legislation or regulation establishing the self-regulating professional body. This consists of the following bodies:

  • International Federation for Information Processing(IFIP)
  • Institute for the Certification of Computing Professionals(ICCP)
  • CIPS Alberta & North West Territories
  • CIPS British Columbia & Yukon
  • CIPS Manitoba
  • CIPS New Brunswick
  • CIPS Newfoundland and Labrador & Nunavut
  • CIPS Maya Scotia
  • CIPS Ontario
  • CIPS Prince Edward Island
  • CIPS Saskatchewan
  • In Québec, CIPS is partnered with the Réseau ACTION TI

Constituent Societies of the ICCP:

  • Association for Computing Machinery(ACM)
  • Association of Information Technology Professionals(CompTIA-AITP)
  • Buchanan Edwards – R2C
  • Canadian Information Processing Society
  • CPCI – Council of Professional Informatics Societies of Argentina
  • DAMA International
  • Global Institute for IT Management
  • Marketing Research & Intelligence Association (MRIA)

Affiliate Societies of the ICCP

  • TDWI – Transforming Data with Intelligence
  • Big Data International (Beijing)
  • Hong Kong Computer Society (HKCS)
  • Argentina, Brazil, Canada, China & Hong Kong (3), Ghana, India, Nigeria, Morocco, Pakistan, Peru, Saudi Arabia, Sultanate of Oman, Tunisia, USA

Who is Eligible to Join Computer Professional Bodies in Canada

To be qualified for the certification in the Computer professional organization, applicant be skilled in computer profession (ICT). Applicant must possess a certificate in any field of computing. Applicant must pass the Computer professional examinations with 50% and above.

Categories of Membership and Qualification

Categories Years of Experience Qualification
Foundation Entry Level Industry Experience/High School Graduate
Associate/Practitioner 2+ years Diploma/AA/Asc/BA/BSc
Master/Expert 4+ Years Diploma/AA/Asc/BA/BSc.
Principal 5+ years BA/BSc/MA/MSc/PhD
Executive 5+ years BA/BSc/MA/MSc/PhD

How to Apply as Member of Computer Professional Society in Canada

To become a member,

  • Visit the organization portal
  • Click the Sign-up link
  • Meet all requirement
  • Pay all designated fees

For more information, please contact the information help desk.
